languages.text: Худые, посиневшие и обледенелые трупы вцепились в крышку контейнера обломанными ногтями. У их ног валяются сломанные ножи. Нашивки на одежде гласят: "Бессердечный".
Emaciated, blue-skinned, frozen corpses cling to the container's lid with broken nails. Shattered knives lie at their feet. The patches on their clothes bear the name "Heartless."
languages.original_text: Худые, посиневшие и обледенелые трупы вцепились в крышку контейнера обломанными ногтями. У их ног валяются сломанные ножи. Нашивки на одежде гласят: "Бессердечный".

traits.locale_text: Emaciated, blue-skinned, frozen corpses cling to the container's lid with broken nails. Shattered knives lie at their feet. The patches on their clothes bear the name "Heartless."
Emaciated, blue-skinned, frozen corpses cling to the container's lid with broken nails. Shattered knives lie at their feet. The patches on their clothes bear the name "Heartless."

Emaciated, blue-skinned, frozen corpses cling to the container's lid with broken nails. Shattered knives lie at their feet. The patches on their clothes bear the name "Heartless."

languages.text: Unos cadáveres congelados y demacrados de piel azul se aferran a la tapa del contenedor con sus uñas rotas. Ves cuchillos rotos a sus pies. Los parches de su ropa muestran el nombre «Desalmada».
languages.original_text: Emaciated, blue-skinned, frozen corpses cling to the container's lid with broken nails. Shattered knives lie at their feet. The patches on their clothes bear the name "Heartless."

traits.locale_text: Unos cadáveres congelados y demacrados de piel azul se aferran a la tapa del contenedor con sus uñas rotas. Ves cuchillos rotos a sus pies. Los parches de su ropa muestran el nombre «Desalmada».

languages.text: 几具瘦弱不堪的尸体已经被冻得发紫，破碎的指甲死死地抓着集装箱的盖板，衣服的补丁上绣着“无心号”的字样。
languages.original_text: Emaciated, blue-skinned, frozen corpses cling to the container's lid with broken nails. Shattered knives lie at their feet. The patches on their clothes bear the name "Heartless."

traits.locale_text: 几具瘦弱不堪的尸体已经被冻得发紫，破碎的指甲死死地抓着集装箱的盖板，衣服的补丁上绣着“无心号”的字样。

languages.text: やせ細った青白い肌の凍った死体の割れた爪がコンテナの蓋にしがみついている。ぼろぼろのナイフが彼らの足下に落ちている。彼らの服の記章には、「ハートレス」の名が記されている。
languages.original_text: Emaciated, blue-skinned, frozen corpses cling to the container's lid with broken nails. Shattered knives lie at their feet. The patches on their clothes bear the name "Heartless."

traits.locale_text: やせ細った青白い肌の凍った死体の割れた爪がコンテナの蓋にしがみついている。ぼろぼろのナイフが彼らの足下に落ちている。彼らの服の記章には、「ハートレス」の名が記されている。

languages.text: Abgemagerte gefrorene Leiber mit blauer Haut krallen sich mit abgebrochenen Nägeln in den Deckel des Containers. Zu ihren Füßen liegen geborstene Messer. Die Aufnäher ihrer Kleidung tragen den Namen "Heartless".
languages.original_text: Emaciated, blue-skinned, frozen corpses cling to the container's lid with broken nails. Shattered knives lie at their feet. The patches on their clothes bear the name "Heartless."

traits.locale_text: Abgemagerte gefrorene Leiber mit blauer Haut krallen sich mit abgebrochenen Nägeln in den Deckel des Containers. Zu ihren Füßen liegen geborstene Messer. Die Aufnäher ihrer Kleidung tragen den Namen "Heartless".

languages.text: Les mains aux ongles partiellement arrachés de cadavres gelés, aux traits émaciés et à la peau bleuie, s'agrippent au couvercle du conteneur. Des couteaux brisés gisent à leurs pieds. Les écussons cousus sur leurs vêtements portent la mention « Sans-Cœur ».
languages.original_text: Emaciated, blue-skinned, frozen corpses cling to the container's lid with broken nails. Shattered knives lie at their feet. The patches on their clothes bear the name "Heartless."

traits.locale_text: Les mains aux ongles partiellement arrachés de cadavres gelés, aux traits émaciés et à la peau bleuie, s'agrippent au couvercle du conteneur. Des couteaux brisés gisent à leurs pieds. Les écussons cousus sur leurs vêtements portent la mention « Sans-Cœur ».

languages.text: Bir deri bir kemik kalmış, mavi tenli, donmuş cesetler; kırık tırnaklarıyla konteyner kapağına tutunmuş. Ayaklarının dibinde ise parçalanmış bıçaklar bulunuyor. Giysilerindeki yamalar, "Taşkalp" ismini taşıyor.
languages.original_text: Emaciated, blue-skinned, frozen corpses cling to the container's lid with broken nails. Shattered knives lie at their feet. The patches on their clothes bear the name "Heartless."

traits.locale_text: Bir deri bir kemik kalmış, mavi tenli, donmuş cesetler; kırık tırnaklarıyla konteyner kapağına tutunmuş. Ayaklarının dibinde ise parçalanmış bıçaklar bulunuyor. Giysilerindeki yamalar, "Taşkalp" ismini taşıyor.
